definition: chanyu (Han Dynasty name for chiefs of Xiongnu Huns 匈奴[Xiong1 nu2])
surname Shan
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Yu
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
in/at/to/from/by/than/out of

sentences.english: The direct causation is the fighting for the Chanyu's heirdom.
sentences.chinese: 争夺单于继承权的斗争直接导致了匈奴的分裂。

sentences.english: As the rocket sped toward Mulan and Shan-Yu, Mulan pinned Shan-Yu to the roof with his sword.
sentences.chinese: 火箭冲向屋顶上的木兰和单与，木兰正用剑指着单于。

sentences.english: Mulan tried to find someone to help her as Shang presented Shan-Yu'ssword to the Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 李翔把单于的剑呈给皇帝，木兰也正在四处找人帮忙。

sentences.english: Chanyu means the chief of Xiongnu.
Just then, Mulan fainted from the wound caused by Shan-Yu's sword.
sentences.chinese: 说完，木兰因为受到了单于的剑伤而昏到了。

sentences.english: So his name is Huhanye Chanyu.
sentences.chinese: 所以应该是呼韩邪单于。

sentences.english: The envoys tried to enrage Hun and made Chanyu to fight with Han.
sentences.chinese: 匈奴贵人使者作为单于先行而入汉，死于中原。

definition: Xiongnu, a people of the Eastern Steppe who created an empire that flourished around the time of the Qin and Han dynasties
formal wife of a Xiongnu chief during the Han Dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
khan (loanword)
Xianbei or Xianbi, group of northern nomadic peoples
Turkic ethnic group
Eastern barbarian/ancient ethnic group of northeast frontier of China
ancient people of central Asia during the Han dynasty
Wuhuan (nomadic tribe)
Huihe, pre-Tang name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur
ethnic groups in the north and west of China in ancient times/foreigner/barbarian
Tuyuhun, a Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/a state in Qinhai in 4th-7th century AD
Wusun kingdom of central Asia (c. 300 BC-300 AD)
tent of the commanding officer/tent capital of a nomadic people
Huihu, Tang dynasty name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
Qidan or Khitan, ethnic group in ancient China, a branch of the Eastern Hu people inhabiting the valley of the Xar Murun River in the upper reaches of the Liao River 遼河|辽河[Liao2 He2]
